org.macroing.gdt.openrc

Class RayCasterKernel

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.amd.aparapi.Kernel
      • org.macroing.gdt.openrc.AbstractRayCasterKernel
        • org.macroing.gdt.openrc.RayCasterKernel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable

    public final class RayCasterKernel
extends AbstractRayCasterKernel
    The values in the float array rays consists of the following:
    1. Origin X
    2. Origin Y
    3. Origin Z
    4. Direction X
    5. Direction Y
    6. Direction Z
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Jörgen Lundgren
